results.content: Lisa Catalano did a great job explaining how Sass works and the examples were clear and easy to follow. This is a very good first course to learn Sass.
results.content_html: Lisa Catalano did a great job explaining how Sass works and the examples were clear and easy to follow. This is a very good first course to learn Sass.

results.content: Perfect. I am NOT a designer. I know about CSS principles, but trying to not touch such HELL. With SASS and COMPASS (even that unsupported now, still valid and working, rather "completed") its all again PROGRAMMING. SASS is like Typescript for JS. Course introduces basics tweaks on complete website mixed with examples on simple pages, perfectly. AND finally introduces some imaginable GUI tools to simplify everything even more. But go through this course fundamentals. Again, even I do NOT know CSS, I was able to understand the point. Always you see some complex CSS of any page these days, dont fear, it was not done manually, period. It was GENERATED from basic and simple abstractions somewhere on top of SASS source. Thanks for this course!

Always you see some complex CSS of any page these days, dont fear, it was not done manually, period. It was GENERATED from basic and simple abstractions somewhere on top of SASS source. Thanks for this course!

results.content: Course was awesome and easy to follow, i didn't know how useful sass was, the only thing i would improve is to use mention what shortcuts you used or have a software that displays exactly what you type. At times i wanted to know how you did certain actions like moving big pieces of code across the document. :) thanks
results.content_html: Course was awesome and easy to follow, i didn't know how useful sass was, the only thing i would improve is to use mention what shortcuts you used or have a software that displays exactly what you type. At times i wanted to know how you did certain actions like moving big pieces of code across the document. :) thanks

results.content: The courses teaches you what you need to know and Lisa takes you step by step. There are a few moments where it is not clear what she is copying and pasting between files so you need to figure this out. And also Lisa's voice can drone on a bit, it sounds like she is reading in a monotone voice from a script. Lisa, a good idea would be to engage your students a bit more! Otherwise a good course for beginners
results.content_html: The courses teaches you what you need to know and Lisa takes you step by step. There are a few moments where it is not clear what she is copying and pasting between files so you need to figure this out. And also Lisa's voice can drone on a bit, it sounds like she is reading in a monotone voice from a script. Lisa, a good idea would be to engage your students a bit more! Otherwise a good course for beginners

results.content: I was intimidated by Sass when I decided to take this course and Lisa quickly showed me that Sass is a help, not a hindrance, to my coding. Thank you!
results.content_html: I was intimidated by Sass when I decided to take this course and Lisa quickly showed me that Sass is a help, not a hindrance, to my coding. Thank you!

results.content: Great course to learn SASS basics quickly!
results.content_html: Great course to learn SASS basics quickly!

results.content: This is a very well explained course. If you are a visual learner like me and want to learn the basics of Sass, this is the one to go. 2 or 3 hours and you can get on track.
results.content_html: This is a very well explained course. If you are a visual learner like me and want to learn the basics of Sass, this is the one to go. 2 or 3 hours and you can get on track.

results.content: This course was great!  The lectures were short, and easy to understand.  The videos were easy to follow, and the instructor was easy to understand.  I like that the videos each covered one small area, because that makes it all the easier to go back and refer to specific portions later.  Definitely recommend if you're interested in learning some more about Sass.
results.content_html: This course was great! The lectures were short, and easy to understand. The videos were easy to follow, and the instructor was easy to understand. I like that the videos each covered one small area, because that makes it all the easier to go back and refer to specific portions later. Definitely recommend if you're interested in learning some more about Sass.

results.content: If you already know CSS you'll have no problem with SASS, and this class really helps tick all the core subject areas off your learning list. Within just a few videos I was able to fully understand how SASS worked, how the syntax worked, and was already thinking of ways I could use it. This is quite a basic course, but then SASS is quite a basic preprocessor so there isn't a tonne of complicated stuff to learn. I really recommend this class!
results.content_html: If you already know CSS you'll have no problem with SASS, and this class really helps tick all the core subject areas off your learning list. Within just a few videos I was able to fully understand how SASS worked, how the syntax worked, and was already thinking of ways I could use it. This is quite a basic course, but then SASS is quite a basic preprocessor so there isn't a tonne of complicated stuff to learn. I really recommend this class!

results.content: Bien que le cours date maintenant de quelques années, le propos est toujours bon et le contenu pertinent.
results.content_html: Bien que le cours date maintenant de quelques années, le propos est toujours bon et le contenu pertinent.

results.content: Very good explanations and DOES get you going with SASS. I found myself fast forwarding a few times but to be fair the course title says 'Step by Step...' so if you some experience with javascript or jquery for example you will get it twice as fast.
results.content_html: Very good explanations and DOES get you going with SASS. I found myself fast forwarding a few times but to be fair the course title says 'Step by Step...' so if you some experience with javascript or jquery for example you will get it twice as fast.

results.content:
Perfect course.
The language is clear. The presenter is understandable.
No unnecessary information. All actions are clearly explained and presented with examples. Main advantages of SASS are pointed out, and it makes me want to start using/practices SASS right away.
I also like that at the end there is brief review of tools, which can be used, and list of things to look at, if you want to learn more advanced SASS.
Great course!
results.content_html:
Perfect course.
The language is clear. The presenter is understandable.
No unnecessary information. All actions are clearly explained and presented with examples. Main advantages of SASS are pointed out, and it makes me want to start using/practices SASS right away.
I also like that at the end there is brief review of tools, which can be used, and list of things to look at, if you want to learn more advanced SASS.
Great course!

results.content: Good overview of the fundamentals. There were a couple of areas I felt were slightly rushed.  The GitHub example files didn't 100% match the presentation, but overall very useful.
results.content_html: Good overview of the fundamentals. There were a couple of areas I felt were slightly rushed. The GitHub example files didn't 100% match the presentation, but overall very useful.

results.content: The instructor did a very good job explaining what was be taught.
results.content_html: The instructor did a very good job explaining what was be taught.

results.content: Lisa's course is all content and practical application in front of your eyes.  No fluff. I highly recommend for anyone out there wanting to dip their toes into SASS.  I'm onto the next course in this series.
results.content_html: Lisa's course is all content and practical application in front of your eyes. No fluff. I highly recommend for anyone out there wanting to dip their toes into SASS. I'm onto the next course in this series.

results.content: Lisa does a great job on this course, it goes at a nice pace for beginners to Sass and is easy to understand.
results.content_html: Lisa does a great job on this course, it goes at a nice pace for beginners to Sass and is easy to understand.

results.content: I had been exposed to LESS a little bit on a prior project, this was a great brush-up for various upcoming projects that I'm stepping into that already use SASS.  I also appreciated the instructors consideration in regards to bloated CSS and steps to minification.
results.content_html: I had been exposed to LESS a little bit on a prior project, this was a great brush-up for various upcoming projects that I'm stepping into that already use SASS. I also appreciated the instructors consideration in regards to bloated CSS and steps to minification.

results.content: It is a good intro class structured well, not for experienced devs but great for beginners.
results.content_html: It is a good intro class structured well, not for experienced devs but great for beginners.

results.content: Now ready to move to the next sep on Sass. Thank you so much Lisa!
